title: Clean-up
text: We have monthly cleanups that gives us avenue to carry out sanitation in communities.

title: Product
text: We make Eco-friendly products which are affordable amd we also offer return and get discount on next product .

title: Education
text: We take advantage of the knowledge economy to bridge the gap between head-knowledge and real life problem solving through researches and writing.

title: Campaign
text: Our campaign strategies will be to reach out to in-school students on waste management and recycling. We also make use of Instagram live for our webinar to reach out to as many as possible.

title: Empowerment
text: Our empowerment programs are targeted to youths and women from low income background in Africa training them on how to convert their waste to wealth with proper mentorship.
